hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Red Rupee# and #the Bolero of Fire#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern MQ Iron Boots Chest

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #deep in the wasteland# is #a Red Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: Plandomizer is a pathway to many abilities some consider to be... unnatural.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: Did you know that ReDead eat their defeated friends?

HC (Malon).text: They say that #a Magic Meter# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #2# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle MQ Deku Scrub Left

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's River# is a foolish choice.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #3# major items.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold respectively...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple MQ GS Sun Block Room

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle MQ Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ Big Lava Room Left Pot

SFM (Saria).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Ice Cavern#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #the Serenade of Water#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Zora's Domain# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground MQ Lobby Right Pot 1

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple Main Room L2 Pot 2

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to #the Tower#.
